alert.note: Alert for Hanson (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 11 at 2:31PM MDT until May 11 at 3:00PM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 400 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN MCCOOK...SOUTHEASTERN HANSON...NORTHWESTERN TURNER AND NORTHEASTERN HUTCHINSON COUNTIES... At 329 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Freeman, or 16 miles west of Parker, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Freeman, Canistota, Bridgewater, Emery, Clayton and Dolton. At 329 pm CDT a trained spotter in Freeman reported ping pong ball sized hail. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for southeastern South Dakota. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
